import dayjs from"dayjs";/**
 * A function to convert colours in hex format to RGB (Red, Green Blue) format.
 * @param {String} hex - the hex to be converted to RGB.
 * @returns {String} - the RGB value corresponding to the parsed hex code.
 */import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const hexToRgb=hex=>{hex=hex.replace('#','');var bigint=parseInt(hex,16);var r=bigint>>16&255;var g=bigint>>8&255;var b=bigint&255;return`rgba(${r}, ${g}, ${b}, 0.2)`;};/**

 * @returns 
 */function Badges(_ref){let{code,colour,dueDate}=_ref;const styling="flex-center text-[0.85rem] text-text font-medium rounded-steep "+"px-base py-xs whitespace-nowrap";return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between mt-base",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styling,style:{background:hexToRgb(colour)},children:["# ",code.replace(/\s/g,"").toUpperCase()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styling,style:{background:hexToRgb(colour)},children:["@ ",dayjs(dueDate).format("DD-MM-YYYY")]})]});}export default Badges;
